</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Select a sound declared in the [[Description.ext#Sound|Description.ext]] of the mission to be played the first time the [[Briefing.html#Plan|Plan tab]] is selected in the [[Briefing.html|briefing]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onBriefingPlan''' soundName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onBriefingPlan]] "PlanVoiceOver"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[Description.ext#Sounds|CfgSounds]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
